body.name: KALADO Air Purifiers KCA01 for Home Large Room up to 1300sqft, Work with Alexa, PM2.5 Monitor,25dB Low Noise H13 True HEPA Filter Removes Up to 99.97% of Particles, Pet Allergies, Smoke, Dust
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 15 mins
features: Over 99.97% purification rate: With H13 true HEPA triple filter, effectively filters particles as small as 0.3 microns, such as pet hair/dander, pollen, dust, etc. Better air quality, better breathing.

HEPA Air Purifier for Home Large Room: With CADR 141CFM/260m³/h, kalado air cleaners for home clean a room up to 350 sq ft within 18 minutes, 520 sq ft within 30 minutes, and 1300 sq ft within 1 hour at high speed. This H13 true HEPA filter air purifier large room is perfect for your house, living rooms, bedrooms, offices, kitchens, and apartments. CARB-certified standard air purifier.

Smart Control: Supports phone (Osaio free APP) control and Alexa is also perfectly adapted. The purifier is equipped with a unique LED screen design that provides you with a clear display of PM2.5 levels in real-time and reflected on your phone APP. You can turn on the purifier with the app on your way home and get a breath of fresh air as soon as you get home! Or free your hands and wake up the purifier by voice.

Two Modes: In auto mode, with a particle sensor to monitor the PM2.5 content of the room in real-time and will adjust its cleaning work (five wind speeds) to protect your family's health; In night mode, the display light is off and the noise is reduced to 25 db, perfect for a quiet and soothing indoor environment. We designed the night light at the bottom, so don't worry about waking up at night and not seeing anything. (All these operations can be achieved through the APP).

Official Kalado Filters（Unwashable） Search for B09YVM4W2C or Kalado replacement filter to find Kalado's Air Purifiers replacement filter. Kalado filters provide the best fit and filtration, while off-brand filters are unreliable and may damage the air purifier.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elegantly Simple Design Versatile decoration styles Press-Button Control Panel Gently press the buttons for analog control Bottom Fastener Stable frame, easy to disassemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its a good product.
reviews.reviewText: After using it for a month, I can easily say that it is a good product. It comes with a 1 year warranty so it is also safe to say that there won’t be any problem until a year. I’m not sure how long it will actually last but from the build quality and proper handling, I’d say it should last a good 2-2.5 years. I checked the filters and i can estimate that we need to change these once every 4-5 months of 8 hours/day usage (based on my usage). Obviously, it depends on what kind of environment you’re using the purifier for. Also, it is pretty quiet at the medium setting (sound level is around 12-14 dB). It could be a little annoying for some people at high setting. But overall, it is what one can expect from a product if this price range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and stylish air purifier
reviews.reviewText: A comparison would be with the Winix 5500 that I currently use in my apartment.The device has a compact footprint and looks quite stylish and modern. Dyson handheld vacuum for comparison. It was easy to set up. I only had to remove the plastic wrap from the two filters inside of the air purifier and plug it in.When running the air purifier at low, it is nearly silent. The noise ramps up as you go from setting 2–4 at the highest it is comparable to the noise of the Winix at level 4. Of course, air exchange cannot be directly compared; this is half the size of my other air purifier. The airflow at setting three on my previous air purifier is about the same as the highest on this one.I don’t think I would be using the lights since it is in a bedroom where excess light is not good for sleep. Did not try the app or Wi-Fi connection since I put the air purifier on the automatic mode. Cannot comment on the sensitivity of the sensor quite yet at this time. May update it later.The air purifier consumables apparently last about three months per the labeling. The carbon and HEPA filter are not separate so you would have to exchange both at the same time. There is a pre-filter on the HEPA side rather than the carbon side, which may cause the HEPA filter to clog before the carbon filter is exhausted. This is the opposite of the Winix air purifier. The plug is also a transformer which can take up more space on a power outlet. I also hope that future purchases of the replacement HEPA filters will not be an issue with a smaller company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I don't trust the air quality numbers
reviews.reviewText: Update: dropped another 2 stars. It's definitely not reading numbers right. I noticed it was never changing off of 10, which, you know, things change and that should at least vary a little. Especially in a small room with a litter box. So I intentionally sprayed some different cleaners near it, which used to set it off...nothing.I went to get new filters, thinking maybe that was the issue. They'll take weeks to get here and are outrageously overpriced. There doesn't seem to be any officially compatible brand, and I don't want to pay half of what I paid for this every six months max.Maybe I got a dud. But, my cheap purifiers seem to do much better work.---I got this for my basement, a space with so much dust in the air that people have had asthma attacks from just being in there. This says the air quality is great! DEFINITELY not.Meanwhile, I put it in a room with totally normal air quality, no issues ever, and it has a number so high you'd think I had it in an animal shelter where someone just burned popcorn, so there's smoke everywhere. Like, "how are you not dead?" bad quality.And when I originally did it in this room just yesterday? It was at 10, which is really good quality. Today, it's shown at at over 700. I understand variations, but sheesh!The manual offers no troubleshooting suggestions, and their website doesn't offer help for this product.So, I just don't think I trust it. But I do think it's purifying the air, so returning it may be more of a hassle than it's worth?Adding: Put a photo on. It's in an enclosed closet that stores paint, glue, etc. and probably hasn't been cleaned in over 10 years after being left like this by previous owners. It's got spiders, dust, mouse poop, some evidence of mold, and, of course, paint fumes. I wanted to take care of the air before I dug in. It says 9, which is superb air quality. In my regularly cleaned living room, it said the quality was so bad I should probably be dead. Again...not sure I trust it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact but strong
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It is a high quality air purifer. Not disappointed. I bough it for my one year old baby, since sometime the neibor smokes and the smell always flies in the baby's room. This purifer only take 10 min to refresh the air of the room. The purifier is very compact but it has two filters which doulbles the air flow and refresh faster than I though. Furthermore, it has a night light which is very usefule at night and it looks very nice! They clean the air beautifully. I am beyond pleased with the results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend but...
reviews.reviewText: This is a great machine. Nice digital display and nightlight. Can't find the filters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top quality, easy to use -- perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I've got 5 air filters throughout my house, and this is my favorite. It's quiet, got all of the features you'd want (tunable lights, auto-mode for fan, nighttime mode) and more (e.g., smart app, display of the current air quality). It was easy to use and set up. The filters feel sturdier and more substantial than any other I've ever used. Highly recommend.It's definitely worth the price -- outperforms all of the competitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase
reviews.reviewText: - I saw significant differences in the air in my room and when I step outside with air in my room significantly clean. It works very well.- I like how I can control it comfortable with my phone without any hassle.- I like how it is not very big and takes small amount of space.I’m happy with the purchase so far 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and smart
reviews.reviewText: I placed in my working room and set auto sensor air quality all day and never turn off.It was quiet you will never notice it was there unless when you light up the candle the fan become louder, make sense and it works.It come with app so can control by the smart phone as wish, love it.
This product is great for ongoing clean air in your house. Been using it for a couple months and it does a fantastic job.

Der Luftreiniger ist schnell in der App angelegt und schnell mit den Smartspeakern verbunden, mit denen man das Gerät einfach steuern kann. Gerade in der Pollensaison hat uns der Luftreiniger von seiner Leistung überzeugt. Der Ruhemodus ist angenehm, wenn man das Gerät in der Nacht anlassen will und die Zeitsteuerung ist eine gute Sache.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Effective and Aesthetically Pleasing Air Purifier with a Handy App
reviews.reviewText: I’m quite satisfied with this air purifier’s performance. It seems to work efficiently in maintaining a clean and refreshing atmosphere indoors. The device doesn’t compromise on looks either - its stylish design fits nicely into modern interiors, proving to be not just functional but also pleasing to the eye.An added bonus is the accompanying app, which offers a convenient way to control the purifier. It runs smoothly and seems well-integrated, providing a user-friendly experience.The one area where I harbor some doubt is the trustworthiness of the PM2.5 sensor. While it’s hard to verify its accuracy without professional testing equipment, the device seems to respond appropriately to changes in air quality. So while I’m unsure about the precise accuracy of the sensor readings, it appears to do its job adequately.Overall, I would recommend this air purifier for anyone in search of a device that blends effectiveness, good looks, and tech-savvy features. The sensor’s accuracy might be a question mark, but it doesn’t deter from the purifier’s overall performance.

After looking at quite a few air purifier products on Amazon with similar capacities 900-1000 sqft, I found this one was priced right (discounted) and had all the features I wanted like particle display, app control and relatively inexpensive filters. The ambient light is also a nice feature. Very happy with it so far after a few months of use. I purchased one for each floor so it also nice be able to control from one (iOS) app. Recommended.

I have allergies and problems with fire PM2.5 particles . I've noted my spits are not black anymore but gray or just not colored. I have moisture problems in my appartment also and have way less itchy eyes and respiratory problems.It works well even if I'm not sure the meter on it for PM2.5 is accurate. The filters seems to do the job and I'l buy other filters for it. I recommend it but it makes a lot of noise if you use the max speed. In my case, I don't care but ... it can be disturbing for some. That said , most of the time , I was using speed 3 and it cleared enough the around 360 square feet space here.I recommend it for the price and the CAD value which is good compared to competitors of the same price.I don't use a lot the applications on Androïd which seems to gather informations to send them to the company and I don't like this.The sleep mode is not noisy but sincerely , it looks like a gadget because it's so gentle it probably don't do any difference at this state. Maybe a bit for small rooms .
